sqlMap.select: select ID as id, NAME as name, SEX as sex, AGE as age, BIRTHDAY as birthday, CSDSHENG as csdsheng, CSDSHI as csdshi, CSDXIAN as csdxian, CSDJDMPH as csdjdmph, BMID as bmid, BMMC as bmmc, AH as ah, SFYX as sfyx, CJRID as cjrid, CJRXM as cjrxm, CJRBMID as cjrbmid, CJRBMMC as cjrbmmc from ZHOUKX_STUDY where 1=1
select count(1) as id from ZHOUKX_STUDY where 1=1
sqlMap.insert: insert into ZHOUKX_STUDY ( ID, NAME, SEX, AGE, BIRTHDAY, CSDSHENG, CSDSHI, CSDXIAN, CSDJDMPH, BMID, BMMC, AH, SFYX, CJRID, CJRXM, CJRBMID, CJRBMMC )values( #id#, #name#, #sex#, #age#, #birthday#, #csdsheng#, #csdshi#, #csdxian#, #csdjdmph#, #bmid#, #bmmc#, #ah#, #sfyx#, #cjrid#, #cjrxm#, #cjrbmid#, #cjrbmmc# )
sqlMap.update: update ZHOUKX_STUDY set ID = #id#, NAME = #name#, SEX = #sex#, AGE = #age#, BIRTHDAY = #birthday#, CSDSHENG = #csdsheng#, CSDSHI = #csdshi#, CSDXIAN = #csdxian#, CSDJDMPH = #csdjdmph#, BMID = #bmid#, BMMC = #bmmc#, AH = #ah#, SFYX = #sfyx#, CJRID = #cjrid#, CJRXM = #cjrxm#, CJRBMID = #cjrbmid#, CJRBMMC = #cjrbmmc# where 1=1 and ID = #id#
sqlMap.select: select ID as id, NAME as name, SEX as sex, AGE as age, BIRTHDAY as birthday, CSDSHENG as csdsheng, CSDSHI as csdshi, CSDXIAN as csdxian, CSDJDMPH as csdjdmph, BMID as bmid, BMMC as bmmc, AH as ah, SFYX as sfyx, CJRID as cjrid, CJRXM as cjrxm, CJRBMID as cjrbmid, CJRBMMC as cjrbmmc from ZHOUKX_STUDY where 1=1 and ID = #id#
sqlMap.delete: delete from ZHOUKX_STUDY where 1=1 and ID = #id#
